title: Need 100 rp or 13 orange essence
body:
Can you please gift me 100 rp or 13 orange essence <3 
if so,is there anything that i need to do

replies.body: We like to help when we can, but in this case the amount be requested is a bit too high.  We don't currently gift out essence, but keep playing and it will come on its own with time!

100 RP might be right at the borderline for the amount they're willing to give for art, but you can always give it a shot. You can pick anything league related to draw, and either post it here or submit a ticket with your request for RP. Unfortunately, they do not give out essence though.
